x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
When you have completed the install of Nuvolo application, verify the following number of components in the instance vs what mentioned in Installation docs of installed scope application :
Tables Business Rules Client Scripts Script Includes UI Scripts UI Pages UI Macros Fix Scripts UI Policies Script Actions UI Actions
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Component verification of installed app
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Verify with count mentioned on installation doc. If found mismatching(spefically count less than mentioned in doc in that case only) reach out to nuvolo technnical engineering team.
